body:
Hey guys, 

SO I just renamed myself from Kryptological, to HartBeat. And I quickly wanted to explain its meaning; 

  • The Hart part comes from my last name
  • Beat comes from my love for music
  • Put them together, I'm combining both an internal part about myself, and a part of my real outside identity! Cool huh?

ANYWAYS.....

Ask Me Anything you people want <3 <3 <3 <3 <3


!AMA AMA AMA!
!AMA AMA AMA!
!AMA AMA AMA!
!AMA AMA AMA!
!AMA AMA AMA!
!AMA AMA AMA!

title: New Name, New Identity, AMA time!

replies.body: canuck_pro or HartBeat, cos I will still call you canuck

replies.body: HartBeat... I'd like it if people just call me 'Hart'
